title: [Badlands, Gully]
description: The riverbed is filled with stones, some coarse, some smooth, some huge, and some ground into fine sand, with no clear point where the one gives way to the other.  The swirling winds and flood waters have sculpted the sandy banks into fantastic shapes that crumble in your fingers.

The riverbed is filled with stones, some coarse, some smooth, some huge, and some ground into fine sand, with no clear point where the one gives way to the other.  The swirling winds and flood waters have sculpted the sandy banks into fantastic shapes that gleam almost like snow in the faint moonlight.
